technicalRepresentation.source:
<zofar:page uid="page30" xmlns:zofar="http://www.his.de/zofar/xml/questionnaire" xmlns:display="http://www.dzhw.eu/zofar/xml/display" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
    <zofar:body uid="b">
        <zofar:questionSingleChoice uid="sc">
            <zofar:header>
                <zofar:question block="true" uid="q">Haben Sie Kinder?</zofar:question>
            </zofar:header>
            <zofar:responseDomain itemClasses="true" uid="rd" variable="k3kinder">
                <zofar:answerOption label="Ja" uid="ao1" value="1"/>
                <zofar:answerOption label="Nein" uid="ao2" value="2"/>
            </zofar:responseDomain>
        </zofar:questionSingleChoice>
    </zofar:body>
    <zofar:transitions>
        <zofar:transition condition="k3kinder.value==2" target="page32"/>
        <zofar:transition target="page31"/>
    </zofar:transitions>
</zofar:page>
